text: Paixão Afonso (born 2 January 1991) is an Angolan sailor. At the 2016 Summer Olympics he competed in the Men's 470 with Matias Montinho. They finished in 26th place. He has qualified to represent Angola at the 2020 Summer Olympics in the men's 470 with Matias Montinho again. ==References== Category:Olympic sailors of Angola Category:1991 births Category:Sailors at the 2016 Summer Olympics – 470 Category:Living people Category:African Games bronze medalists for Angola Category:African Games medalists in sailing Category:Competitors at the 2011 All-Africa Games Category:Angolan male sailors (sport)
title: Paixão Afonso
